translations.translation: and the mountains like tufts of coloured wool.
The mountains like the tufts of carded wool.
and the mountains shall be like fluffs of carded wool in varying colours.
and mountains will be like carded wool.
And mountains will be like flying wool.
And the mountains will be like wool, carded.
And the mountains shall be as loosened wool.
and the mountains shall be like plucked wool-tufts.
And the mountains will become as carded wool.
and the mount-ains like tufts of carded wool.
And the mountains shall become as wool carded,
and the mountains like carded wool.
And the mountains will be like carded wool.
And the mountains will be like carded wool,
and the mountains like tufts of carded wool.
And the mountains will be like tufted wool.
And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.
[101:5] and the mountains will be like tufts of wool, like carded wool in terms of the lightness with which it floats [in the air] until it comes to settle upon the earth.
And the mountains will become as carded wool.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ } فالعِهنُ: الصُّوفُ الأَحمرُ

translations.translation:
And the mountains will be like tufts of wool,

The wool referred to here is the red wool.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَتَكُونُ ٱلْجِبَالُ } من كمال قهر الله وغضبه { كَٱلْعِهْنِ ٱلْمَنفُوشِ } [القارعة: 5] أي: كالصوف الملون المندوف
 تطير في جو الهواء يمنة ويسرة
